Documentation

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Grid

Grids provide the foundation you need to organize content.
Use a .row element to hold .col elements.
Unsized column elements will automatically expand to fill a row; Set specific widths from 1-12 using .[screen-size]-[width] classes.
Each row can hold a maximum of 12 column units. More information on screen-sizes can be found on boba's helper page.
one
auto
two
auto
three
auto
four
auto
five
auto
six
auto
seven
auto
eight
auto
nine
auto
ten
auto
eleven
auto
twelve 
<!-- A standard 3-column, responsive layout -->
<div class="row">
    <div class="col xs-12 sm-12 md-6 lg-4 xl-4">
        <!-- Content here -->
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-12 sm-12 md-6 lg-4 xl-4">
        <!-- Content here -->
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-12 sm-12 md-6 lg-4 xl-4">
        <!-- Content here -->
    </div>
</div>

Gapless Grid

Add the .gapless class to a .row to remove the gaps between the columns.

Gaps

.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4

Gapless

.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4 
<!-- A standard 3-column, gapless, responsive layout -->
<div class="row gapless">
    <div class="col xs-12 sm-12 md-6 lg-4 xl-4">
        <!-- Content here -->
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-12 sm-12 md-6 lg-4 xl-4">
        <!-- Content here -->
    </div>
    <div class="col xs-12 sm-12 md-6 lg-4 xl-4">
        <!-- Content here -->
    </div>
</div>

Offsets

Offset columns in a row by 1-11 units using .offset-[screen-size]-[width] classes to create unique layouts.
Each column can be offset by a maximum of 11 column units. More information on screen-sizes can be found on boba's helper page.
.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4 .offset-xs-4

.col .xs-6 .offset-xs-3
.col 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col xs-6 offset-xs-3">
        <div class="bg-orange text-center vertical-center-content">
            .col .xs-6 .offset-xs-3
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col">
        <div class="bg-yellow text-center vertical-center-content">
            .col
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Vertical Center Content

Easily vertically-center content within a column using the .vertical-center-content class.
.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4
.col .xs-4 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col xs-12">
        <div class="bg-green text-center vertical-center-content">
            .col .xs-12
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Column Alignment

Vertically align columns within a row
.col-top
.col-middle
.col-bottom 
<div class="row" style="height:200px">
    <div class="col col-top xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center">
            <code>.col-top</code>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col col-middle xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center">
            <code>.col-middle</code>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col col-bottom xs-4">
        <div class="bg-light text-center">
            <code>.col-bottom</code>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Row Alignment

Quickly set the vertical alignment of all columns within a row

Row Align Top

Align all columns in a row to the top of the row
.row-align-top
.row-align-top
.row-align-top 
FILL ME IN

Row Align Center

Align all columns in a row to the vertical center of the row
.row-align-center
.row-align-center
.row-align-center 
FILL ME IN

Row Align Bottom

Align all columns in a row to the bottom of the row
.row-align-bottom
.row-align-bottom
.row-align-bottom 
FILL ME IN

Row Align Stretch

All columns in a row will stretch to the max height of the row
The effect is subtle, but trust us, it works!
.row-align-stretch
.row-align-stretch
.row-align-stretch 
FILL ME IN

Row Align Space Around

When a row wraps, each sub-row will have equal half-spacing around them, including the first/last rows.
.row-align-space-around
.row-align-space-around
.row-align-space-around
.row-align-space-around 
FILL ME IN

Row Align Space Between

When a row wraps, each sub-row will have equal spacing between them and the first/last rows will be flush to the containing element.
.row-align-space-between
.row-align-space-between
.row-align-space-between
.row-align-space-between 
FILL ME IN

Row Align Space Evenly

When a row wraps, each sub-row will have equal spacing around them, including the first/last rows.
.row-align-space-evenly
.row-align-space-evenly
.row-align-space-evenly
.row-align-space-evenly 
FILL ME IN

Row Justification

Quickly set the horizontal alignment of all columns within a row

Row Justify Left

Left align all columns in a row
.row-justify-left
.row-justify-left
.row-justify-left 
FILL ME IN

Row Justify Center

Center align all columns in a row
.row-justify-center
.row-justify-center
.row-justify-center 
FILL ME IN

Row Justify Right

Right align all columns in a row
.row-justify-right
.row-justify-right
.row-justify-right 
FILL ME IN

Row Justify Stretch

Stretch all columns in a row to fit the full width
Note: This only works for columns that do not have specified widths.
.row-justify-stretch
.row-justify-stretch
.row-justify-stretch 
FILL ME IN

Row Justify Space Around

Each column in a row will have equal half-spacing around them, including the first/last columns.
.row-justify-space-around
.row-justify-space-around
.row-justify-space-around 
FILL ME IN

Row Justify Space Between

Each column in a row will have equal spacing between them and the first/last columns will be flush to the containing row.
.row-justify-space-between
.row-justify-space-between
.row-justify-space-between 
FILL ME IN

Row Justify Space Evenly

Each column in a row will have equal spacing around them, including the first/last columns.
.row-justify-space-evenly
.row-justify-space-evenly
.row-justify-space-evenly 
FILL ME IN

Row Direction

Quickly change the order and direction of columns in a row

Row Direction Row (Forward)

Default behavior for columns in a row; columns will appear in sequential order.
1
2
.row-direction-row 
FILL ME IN

Row Direction Row Reverse

Columns will appear in reverse-sequential order.
1
2
.row-direction-row-reverse 
FILL ME IN

Row Direction Column

Columns will appear vertically stacked in sequential order.
Note: Column direction will not respect specified column widths and will stretch all columns to fill one row each.
1
2
.row-direction-column 
FILL ME IN

Row Direction Column Reverse

Columns will appear vertically stacked in reverse-sequential order.
Note: Column direction will not respect specified column widths and will stretch all columns to fill one row each.
1
2
.row-direction-column-reverse 
FILL ME IN
